quiz_page.title: Discover Your Growth Potential
quiz_page.subtitle: Answer our quick questionnaire and receive a personalized analysis with suggestions for ideal mentors for your journey.
quiz_page.personalized_analysis_description: Receive insights about your career moment and areas for development
quiz_page.ideal_mentors_description: Discover which types of mentors can help you achieve your goals
quiz_page.get_a_gift_description: Score above 700? Choose between an exclusive pen or button!
quiz_page.responses_confidential: Your answers will help us better understand the needs of participants and recruit volunteer mentors in the most sought-after areas. In addition to contributing to building a stronger and more accessible mentoring community.

quiz_form.question: Question
quiz_form.career_moment_title: What is your current career moment?
quiz_form.career_moment_description: Select the option that best describes your current moment
quiz_form.professional_challenge_title: What is your biggest professional challenge at the moment?
quiz_form.professional_challenge_description: Tell us what worries or challenges you most in your career
quiz_form.mentorship_experience_title: Have you had any experience with mentoring?
quiz_form.mentorship_experience_description: We want to understand your previous experience with mentoring
quiz_form.future_vision_title: Where do you see yourself in 2 years?
quiz_form.future_vision_description: Share your vision for your professional future
quiz_form.development_areas_title: Which areas would you most like to develop?
quiz_form.personal_life_challenges_title: In which personal life challenges could a conversation help you?
quiz_form.personal_life_challenges_description: Such as new hobbies, personal projects, or other aspects of life
quiz_form.share_knowledge_title: Have you ever thought about sharing your knowledge or experience with others?
quiz_form.share_knowledge_description: We want to know if you are also interested in helping other people
quiz_form.contact_information_description: So we can send you your personalized analysis
quiz_form.confidential_responses: Your answers are confidential and will only be used to generate your personalized analysis
quiz_form.challenge_placeholder: Tell us about what worries or challenges you most in your career...
quiz_form.mentorship_yes_useful: Yes, I have been mentored and it was very useful
quiz_form.mentorship_yes_not_good: Yes, but it was not a good experience
quiz_form.mentorship_no_interest: No, but I am very interested
quiz_form.mentorship_no_dont_know: No, and I still don't know if I need it
quiz_form.mentorship_heard_about_it: I've heard of it, but I've never participated
quiz_form.future_vision_placeholder: Share your vision for your professional future...
quiz_form.personal_life_placeholder: Example: Finding a new hobby, developing personal projects, improving relationships, taking care of mental health...
quiz_form.share_knowledge_yes_very: Yes, I am very interested in sharing
quiz_form.share_knowledge_no_never_thought: No, I've never thought about it
quiz_form.share_knowledge_no_time: I would like to, but I don't have time
quiz_form.share_knowledge_already_do: I already do it in some way
quiz_form.analysis_notification: You will receive your analysis by email and an exclusive invitation to access MENVO.
quiz_form.submit_success_description: Please wait while we process your analysis...
quiz_form.submit_error_description: An error occurred while submitting the questionnaire. Please try again.

quiz_results.ai_is_analyzing: Our AI is analyzing your answers
quiz_results.tips_for_better_analysis: Tips for a more accurate analysis
quiz_results.choose_gift: Choose your gift and pick it up at the MENVO booth at RecnPlay.
quiz_results.important_gift_choice: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: You must choose ONE or the OTHER gift
quiz_results.show_result_at_stand: Show this result at the MENVO booth to receive your gift!
quiz_results.based_on_interests: Based on your areas of interest and goals
quiz_results.mentor_status_tooltip: üí° Mentor Status: We show real mentors from the platform based on your profile. "Available" = accepts new mentees | "Full schedule" = temporarily busy
quiz_results.final_message_potential_mentor: You have the potential to be a mentor!
quiz_results.final_message_potential_mentor_descripti: We identified that you are interested in sharing knowledge. Consider registering as a volunteer mentor on the MENVO platform.
quiz_results.share_results_description: Send your analysis by email or share it with friends
